description: Provides the number of days left for each data source used in the free trial period.

parameters.name: DetectorId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the detector of the GuardDuty member account. To find the detectorId in the current Region, see the Settings page in the GuardDuty console, or run the ListDetectors API.

parameters.name: AccountIds
parameters.description: A list of account identifiers of the GuardDuty member account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Accounts
nested_items.description: The member accounts which were included in a request and were processed successfully.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account identifier of the GuardDuty member account.

nested_items.name: DataSources
nested_items.description: Describes the data source enabled for the GuardDuty member account.

nested_items.name: CloudTrail
nested_items.description: Describes whether any Amazon Web Services CloudTrail management event logs are enabled as data sources.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: Kubernetes
nested_items.description: Describes whether any Kubernetes logs are enabled as data sources.

nested_items.name: AuditLogs
nested_items.description: Describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: MalwareProtection
nested_items.description: Describes whether Malware Protection is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: ScanEc2InstanceWithFindings
nested_items.description: Describes whether Malware Protection for EC2 instances with findings is enabled as a data source.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the number of days left to use each enabled data source.

nested_items.name: Features
nested_items.description: A list of features enabled for the GuardDuty account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the feature for which the free trial is configured.

nested_items.name: FreeTrialDaysRemaining
nested_items.description: The number of the remaining free trial days for the feature.

nested_items.name: UnprocessedAccounts
nested_items.description: The member account that was included in a request but for which the request could not be processed.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: A reason why the account hasn't been processed.
